text: _________________lEvent______________|Nonevent Treatment Group ab Control Group cd * Absolute Risk = a/(a+b) and c/(c+d) * Odds = a/b and c/d * Relative Risk = [a/(a+b)] / [c/(c+d)] + Odds Ratio = [a/b] / [c/d] * Absolute risk reduction = a/(a+b) - c/(c+d) * Number needed to treat = 100/[a/(a+b) - c/(c+d)] * Relative risk reduction = | - [a/(a+b)] / [c/(c+d)]
